articles.title: Ricky Ponting's blunt verdict on Mohammed Shami's Asia Cup snub - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shami's Asia Cup omission was considered shocking for most. But not for Australia legend Ricky Ponting, who gave a rather blunt response on Shami's future in the format and possibility of a return for the T20 World Cup later in October.
articles.content: Despite missing every T20I assignment for India since the 2021 World Cup, experts and veterans backed veteran India pacer Mohammed Shami to make a return to the side for the impending Asia Cup tourna… [+1686 chars]

articles.title: Get ready to scream: Halloween Horror Nights at Universal Studios Singapore is back after a two-year hiatus - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The yearly ghostly affair at Universal Studios Singapore is back with more – besides the usual horror houses, visitors to the theme park can look forward to a new laser tag challenge, zombie scare zones and a horror-theme dining experience.
articles.content: Universal Studios Singapores Halloween Horror Nights is finally back for its 10th edition this year. Its last instalment was in 2019, before the COVID-19 pandemic. From Sep 30 to Nov 5, on selected n… [+496 chars]

articles.title: Actress Anne Heche dies after car crash - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Hollywood actress, who had been in a coma with a severe brain injury since the fiery car crash on August 5, has been declared legally dead.
articles.content: Heche, best known for 1990s movies Donnie Brasco and Six Days, Seven Nights as well as a high-profile relationship with talk show host Ellen DeGeneres, crashed her car into a two-storey house in the … [+1108 chars]
